title:
Rwanda genocide: The communication slip-up over 
France's responsibility
summary: The French presidency had said on Thursday that Macron would release a message saying France and its allies 'could have stopped' the bloodshed but lacked the will to do so. In the video message released on Sunday, Emmanuel Macron did not go so far.

title: Donald Trump defers abortion decisions to the states after lengthy deliberation
summary: After seeming to favor a compromise law on abortion, the Republican presidential candidate has eventually sided with the Supreme Court, which repealed this federal right in 2022.

title: Poland's liberal coalition reinforces its success in local elections

title: Kazakhstan and southern Russia experience exceptional flooding
summary: In Russia's Orenburg region, melting ice caused the dam protecting the town of Orsk to burst. In Kazakhstan, 76,000 people had to be evacuated.
